verbs.description: [V: apologize] [ARG1: for using brother death in ri gov rac the sister of a man killed in a 1989 car crash involving a rhode island gubernatorial candidate says one of his political rivals should publicly apologize for bringing up the crash in the campaign robin dubeau joseph a trillo joe trillo rhode island allan fung james skipper] ri
